price: Whoever is spared the punishment on that Day is blessed with His mercy. That is the clear triumph.
arabic: مَّن يُصۡرَفۡ عَنۡهُ يَوۡمَئِذٖ فَقَدۡ رَحِمَهُۥۚ وَذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡفَوۡزُ ٱلۡمُبِينُ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
